title: TFT Unplayable on New Mac OS
body: I can't speak for Summoner's Rift games, but every TFT game I try to play spends maybe 60% disconnected and "attempting to reconnect." I have tried to play through a game on my personal laptop (Macbook Pro recently updated to OS HighSierra) on my home wifi (Comcast Xfinity; generally pretty solid package), and on my work laptop (same model as personal) on my work wifi (god knows what they pay for but I am CONFIDENT this wifi doesn't lag) and the  situation repeated exactly. What is up with Macs now being unable to run TFT?? Anyone have a fix?

replies.body:
Every time there is a major mac update, all third party software shits the bed. Dualboot windows if you want to play games with much better performance and reliability, it is free and pretty easy.

It will probably be fixed in time, but the tiny number of users with macs and even tinier number using OSX dont warrant priority.
